item.title: 华丽七重奏？更像是 "炽热二号 "和 "不温不火五号
item.description: 随着投资者对人工智能的关注，英伟达（Nvidia）和美达（Meta）与曾经炙手可热的其他公司拉开了差距。【原文：Nvidia and Meta have pulled away from the rest of the once-hot group as investors focus on AI.】

item.title: 日元为何如此疲软及其对日本的意义
item.description: 日元对美元汇率继续在历史低点附近徘徊，主要原因是日本的利率仍然远远低于美国和其他国家，从而削弱了日元的相对吸引力。即使在本周早些时候日本央行 17 年来首次提高利率之后，日元的下行压力依然存在。日元下跌对经济、企业和消费者既有利也有弊。日本的政策制定者们仍在警惕他们可能会对日元汇率造成影响。【原文：The yen has continued to languish near its historic low versus the dollar, mainly because interest rates in Japan remain much lower than those in the US and elsewhere, diminishing the currency’s relative allure. The downward pressure persists even after the Bank of Japan raised interest rates earlier this week for the first time in 17 years. The yen’s decline has both benefited and harmed the economy, businesses and consumers. Japanese policymakers remain on guard against the possibility they ma】

item.title: 挪威利率维持在 16 年高位，不急于很快降息
item.description: 2023年11月2日星期四，挪威奥斯陆，挪威央行行长艾达-沃尔登-巴切（Ida Wolden Bache）在利率新闻发布会上。挪威央行自1月份以来首次维持借贷成本不变，并重申了今年再加息一次的计划，因为疲软的克朗阻碍了挪威央行抑制通货膨胀的努力。摄影师弗雷德里克-索尔斯塔德/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Ida Wolden Bache, governor of Norges Bank, during an interest rates news conference in Oslo, Norway, on Thursday, Nov. 2, 2023. Norway's central bank held its borrowing costs unchanged for the first time since January and repeated a plan for one more interest-rate hike this year as a weak krone hampers Norges Bank’s efforts to rein in inflation. Photographer: Fredrik Solstad/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美联储的拖延使最后一英里变得更加艰难
item.description: 央行有可能在降息方面落后于曲线，造成不必要的痛苦。【原文：The central bank risks falling behind the curve on rate cuts, causing unnecessary pain.】

item.title: 阿联酋支持的交易失败，《国民世界》关注《电讯报
item.description: 约克郡邮报》和其他英国地方报纸背后的出版商 National World Plc 在阿联酋支持的竞购被英国政府有效阻止后，再次表示有意收购《每日电讯报》。【原文：National World Plc, the publisher behind the Yorkshire Post and other British local newspapers, has repeated its interest in buying the Telegraph after a UAE-backed bid was effectively blocked by the UK government.】

item.title: 空中客车公司与大韩航空达成 140 亿美元协议，波音公司被冷落
item.description: 大韩航空（Korean Air Lines Co. — typically the carrier's top aircraft supplier — ）放弃了陷入困境的波音公司（Boeing Co. — typically the carrier's top aircraft supplier — to order 33 Airbus SE A350 wide-body jets in a $14 billion deal as it seeks to streamline its fleet before a merger with Asiana Airlines Inc.【原文：Korean Air Lines Co. passed over embattled Boeing Co. — typically the carrier’s top aircraft supplier — to order 33 Airbus SE A350 wide-body jets in a $14 billion deal as it seeks to streamline its fleet ahead of a merger with Asiana Airlines Inc.】

item.title: 伊比利亚电力公司在新战略更新中加倍重视美国电网
item.description: Iberdrola SA 正在加强对电网的关注，将 60% 的新资金分配给 2026 年之前的电网项目。【原文：Iberdrola SA is strengthening its focus on power networks, allocating 60% of new funding to grid projects through 2026.】

item.title: 台湾出人意料地将关键利率上调至 2008 年以来最高水平
item.description: 台湾中央银行出人意料地将基准利率提高到 2008 年以来的最高点，同时加大力度应对顽固的通货膨胀，官员们警告说，这个芯片制造中心可能会面临价格的 "结构性变化"。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank unexpectedly raised its benchmark interest rate to the highest since 2008 as it ramped up efforts to tackle stubborn inflation with officials warning the chip-making hub could face a “structural shift” in prices.】

item.title: 产量增长但石油价格下降导致中国石油集团利润下滑
item.description: 由于油价疲软超过了创纪录的产量，中国石油天然气股份有限公司（Cnooc Ltd. ）去年的年度利润有所下降。【原文：Cnooc Ltd. annual profits fell last year as weaker oil prices outweighed record production.】

item.title: 瑞士央行领先欧洲央行和美联储降息以遏制法郎升值
item.description: 瑞士国家银行将其关键利率下调了 25 个基点，在全球同行可能效仿之前几个月就采取了行动，因为政策制定者试图防止法郎上涨。【原文：The Swiss National Bank cut its key interest rate by 25 basis points, acting months before global peers may follow suit as policymakers try to prevent gains in the franc.】

item.title: 欧元区最大经济体继续努力扭转颓势
item.description: 欧元区最大的两个经济体在 3 月份继续萎缩，使人们更加预期经济活动的持续回升需要更多时间才能实现。【原文：The euro area’s two largest economies continued to contract in March, feeding expectations that a sustained pickup in activity will take more time to materialize.】

item.title: 中国希望在自力更生中压榨更多本地大豆
item.description: 中国可能会要求其大豆压榨商优先考虑本地供应，因为这个世界头号买家正努力减少对进口的依赖。【原文：China may ask its soybean crushers to prioritize local supplies as the world’s top buyer seeks to reduce its reliance on imports.】

item.title: 债务期限临近，国际货币基金组织（IMF）团队赴埃塞俄比亚进行筹资谈判
item.description: 国际货币基金组织官员本周抵达埃塞俄比亚，讨论为该国提供新的支持计划，此时距离暂停偿债协议到期不到两周时间。【原文：International Monetary Fund officials arrived in Ethiopia this week to discuss a new support program for the country, less than two weeks before a debt-service suspension deal is set to expire.】

item.title: 加州和佛罗里达州的房屋保险市场为何崩溃
item.description:
灾难背后的诸多因素。【原文：

The many factors behind the disaster.

】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司十多年来首次实现盈利
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司（Malaysia Airlines）公布了十多年来的首次年度盈利报告，强劲的需求和机票价格的上涨推动了这家陷入困境的航空公司的业绩反弹。【原文：Malaysia Airlines reported its first annual profit in over a decade as strong demand and elevated airfares propel a rebound for the troubled airline.】

item.title: 英国监管机构酝酿养老基金测试，以发现表现不佳者
item.description: 英国养老金监管机构正在权衡一项行业绩效测试，该测试类似于澳大利亚用于淘汰表现不佳基金的指标。【原文：The UK pensions watchdog is weighing an industry performance test that’s similar to a metric used in Australia to weed out underperforming funds.】

item.title: Next 预计将从英国购物者的高消费中获利 10 亿英镑
item.description: Next Plc 预计，随着工资水平的提高，英国购物者将有更多的时间在时装上消费，今年的利润将扩大到近 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）。【原文：Next Plc expects profit to expand to nearly £1 billion ($1.3 billion) of profit this year as rising wages free up British shoppers to spend more on fashion.】

item.title: 英国 2 月份预算赤字高于预期
item.description: 英国政府上个月的借贷高于预期，这使得英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特（Jeremy Hunt）在整个财政年度的预算预计将超额完成。【原文：UK government borrowing came in higher than forecast last month, putting Chancellor of the Exchequer Jeremy Hunt on course to overshoot his budget projections for the full fiscal year.】

item.title: 印度主要反对党国大党称投票前被莫迪的政党 "削弱
item.description: 印度主要反对党印度国民大会指责印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的政府试图在财政上 "削弱 "该党，而此时距离印度即将举行的大选还有数周时间。【原文：India’s main opposition party, the Indian National Congress, accused the government of Prime Minister Narendra Modi of trying to “cripple” the party financially, weeks before the country heads to the polls.】

item.title: 欧洲 2 月汽车销量增长 10%，电动汽车份额暂缓增长
富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
高德美将股价定在最高点，推动欧洲 IPO 市场发展
item.description: 护肤品公司 Galderma Group AG 的 23 亿瑞士法郎（26 亿美元）首次公开募股定价高于市场预期，为缓慢反弹的欧洲上市市场带来了急需的信心。【原文：Skincare company Galderma Group AG priced its 2.3 billion Swiss-franc ($2.6 billion) initial public offering at the top of the marketed range giving much needed confidence to a slowly rebounding market for European listings.】

item.title: 中国对俄罗斯煤炭的进口因进口税而下滑
item.description: 由于中国政府重新征收进口税，俄罗斯煤炭供应的竞争力下降，今年头两个月中国对俄罗斯煤炭的采购量大幅下滑。【原文：Chinese purchases of Russian coal slumped in the first two months of the year, after Beijing reimposed import taxes that make Russian supplies less competitive.】

item.title: 宝马认为，即使需求降温，高级电动车仍将推动增长
item.description: 宝马汽车公司（BMW AG）表示，即使全球电动汽车需求降温，其高端电动汽车今年仍将继续推动增长。【原文：BMW AG said its premium electric vehicles will continue to drive growth this year, even as global demand for EVs cools.】

item.title: 迪拜柏金公司首次公开募股（IPO）耗资 4.29 亿美元，首次亮相即大涨 31
item.description: Parkin Co.PJSC 在迪拜首次公开发行 4.29 亿美元的股票，获得了创纪录的需求量，股价跳涨高达 31%。【原文：Parkin Co. PJSC jumped as much as 31% in its Dubai debut after a $429 million initial public offering that received a record amount of demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 韩国金融服务管理局敦促银行加大对房地产项目的支持力度
item.description: 韩国金融监督机构敦促贷款机构扩大对陷入困境的建筑商的金融支持，因为人们对陷入困境的房地产项目风险的担忧与日俱增。【原文：South Korea’s financial watchdog urged lenders to expand financial support for troubled builders as concerns grow over risks from distressed real estate projects.】

item.title: 英国收购目标要求更多，尽管溢价为多年来最佳
item.description: 英国公司的讨价还价者发现，英国公司也不是省油的灯，即使是最落魄的公司也要与潜在买家争夺更好的收购溢价。【原文：Bargain hunters on the prowl for British companies are finding that UK Plc is no pushover, with even the most beaten-down companies battling would-be buyers for better takeover price premiums.】

item.title: 印度工厂活动上升提振经济，PMI快报显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，受制造业增长的推动，印度3月份的经济活动有所增长。【原文：India’s economic activity increased in March, boosted by gains in the manufacturing sector, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 鲍威尔和上田的 "鹰 "果然像鸽子一样飞翔
item.description:
美联储和日本央行不想表现得过于强势，但也不希望被 "颠簸 "所左右  

。【原文：

The Federal Reserve and Bank of Japan don’t want to come on too strong, but nor do they wish to be pushed around by ‘bumps’  

】
